structure.unit: STATE AND AREA PLANNING -- REGIONAL DEVELOPMENT

law.catch_line: Lieutenant Governor to be member of board.
law.text: One (1) of the two (2) members of the Southern Growth Policies Board appointed by the Governor pursuant to paragraph 2(c) of Article II of the compact set forth in KRS 147.580 shall be the Lieutenant Governor.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1980.
